name: Ghost Revenge (GHMR)
description:
Ghost Revenge. Developed for Mini Jam 117: Ghosts.

Use your shotgun to boost yourself and get your revenge.

Controls:

- Arrows keys to move.

- Space to shoot.

Music:

- Level: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/136914

- Boss: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1043729
